channel.title: Good bots?
channel.description: Does anybody know a good bot? And does anybody know how long I should bot woodcutting for per/day?

item.title: Good bots?
item.dc:creator: @ultimatepkvillage ultimatepkvillage
item.description:
@ultimatepkvillage wrote:

`SJ_:

Does anybody know a good bot? And does anybody know how long I should bot woodcutting for per/day?

use rsbuddy, and since jagex is trying to stop botters I’d say bot for 2days at max

Read full topic

item.title: Good bots?
item.dc:creator: @eyeownyew Eyeownyew
item.description:
@eyeownyew wrote:

[quote=“judostar1, post:37, topic:418228”][quote author=eyeownyew link=topic=520773.msg3784490#msg3784490 date=1318745017]

i put that into my calculator right now, 1/1000 = 0.001%, do you want a freaking screenie of it?

You’re doing 1 divided by 1000, not 1 out of 1000. If you want to look at it that way, put 1/100 into your calculator and it’ll show up as .01% - which you even said yourself is wrong.
[/quote]

I’m getting a percentage, thus the reason why i’m dividing it. But you are right, I forgot to multiply by 100. Now can we get past this confusion/disagreement?[/quote]
Gladly.

Read full topic

item.title: Good bots?
item.dc:creator: @judostar1 judostar1
item.description:
@judostar1 wrote:

[quote=“eyeownyew, post:35, topic:418228”][quote author=judostar1 link=topic=520773.msg3784329#msg3784329 date=1318731028]
i put that into my calculator right now, 1/1000 = 0.001%, do you want a freaking screenie of it?
[/quote]
You’re doing 1 divided by 1000, not 1 out of 1000. If you want to look at it that way, put 1/100 into your calculator and it’ll show up as .01% - which you even said yourself is wrong.[/quote]

I’m getting a percentage, thus the reason why i’m dividing it. But you are right, I forgot to multiply by 100. Now can we get past this confusion/disagreement?

[quote=“m.dog311, post:36, topic:418228”][quote author=judostar1 link=topic=520773.msg3784078#msg3784078 date=1318713930]

so far rsbuddy’s ban rate is like 1:1mil or something.

Lmfao, what? If you mean 1 million people, you’re way off, because more than 300 people have been banned using it.
If you mean $, you’re also way off, because trillions of GP have been made with it. Jagex doesn’t do enough to ban millions of people.

Fine, for you who actually does care about the actual numbers and don’t understand ratios:
Examples:
1:100 get banned for using rsbuddy, depending on the scripts, the ratio changes, let’s say an example you were botting dungeoneering by yourself theres about 1:1000 change of getting banned, which by percentage is about .001% of people get banned.

Let’s say if you were botting something popular to bot like flax, sorcerer’s garden or pest control. The rates go up.
examples:

About 1:50 people get banned at pest control (legit or botting it doesn’t matter), 1:25 gets banned for sorcerer’s garden (wayy more people then pest control) again, doesn’t matter legit or not legit, high ban rate. I’m not even going to mention flax, because I am tongue tied at how much the ban rate is.

Basic logic:
More people bot the activity/skill, higher the odds of getting banned. These ratios are estimates, they could be greater or less.

1:100 means 1 to 100, which also means 1 in 100.
[/quote]
Where are you getting these numbers? I think they’re coming straight from your arse.[/quote]

clearly you can’t read the whole thing, they’re estimates and some were taken from the rsbuddy site, now stop trying to be a fucking big shot a fuck off, don’t come into a random conversation and try to get me all worked up.

Read full topic

examples:

item.title: Good bots?
item.dc:creator: @judostar1 judostar1
item.description:
@judostar1 wrote:

[quote=“eyeownyew, post:32, topic:418228”][quote author=judostar1 link=topic=520773.msg3784305#msg3784305 date=1318729319]

so far rsbuddy’s ban rate is like 1:1mil or something.

Lmfao, what? If you mean 1 million people, you’re way off, because more than 300 people have been banned using it.
If you mean $, you’re also way off, because trillions of GP have been made with it. Jagex doesn’t do enough to ban millions of people.

Fine, for you who actually does care about the actual numbers and don’t understand ratios:
Examples:
1:100 get banned for using rsbuddy, depending on the scripts, the ratio changes, let’s say an example you were botting dungeoneering by yourself theres about 1:1000 change of getting banned, which by percentage is about .001% of people get banned.

Let’s say if you were botting something popular to bot like flax, sorcerer’s garden or pest control. The rates go up.
examples:

About 1:50 people get banned at pest control (legit or botting it doesn’t matter), 1:25 gets banned for sorcerer’s garden (wayy more people then pest control) again, doesn’t matter legit or not legit, high ban rate. I’m not even going to mention flax, because I am tongue tied at how much the ban rate is.

Basic logic:
More people bot the activity/skill, higher the odds of getting banned. These ratios are estimates, they could be greater or less.

1:100 means 1 to 100, which also means 1 in 100.
[/quote] @ First ratio: That’s actually .1%. Your math is way off. I understand the concept of ratios, I’m not a retard. And, your math leads me to think you are, which made me tl;dr your post.

my first ratio is 1:100, which is 1%.

The first one you explained, being 1:1000. Which you said was .001%, which leads me to believe your math is fucking awful.

1 divided by 1000 = .001%, now stop wasting my time.

LMFAO you fail so fucking much. So, if there’s a ratio of 1:100, that means the percentage is .01%? Are you fucking stupid?

1:100 is the same as 1/100, which is 1%, learn rates, ratios and percentages, now stop wasting my time.

You’re right. 1/100 is 1%. 1/1000 is .1%, not .001% you fucking dumbass. I’m not wasting your time, I’m attempting to succeed at what your elementary teacher should have.[/quote]

i put that into my calculator right now, 1/1000 = 0.001%, do you want a freaking screenie of it?

Read full topic

item.title: Good bots?
item.dc:creator: @judostar1 judostar1
item.description:
@judostar1 wrote:

tyb97:

I have never gotten in trouble with epic, I always set it to go kill minotaurs in the barb. village strong hold 1st lvl. No one ever walks through there, it got me to like 72 att.

rsbuddy fighter script (vip), got me 70-99 str going the red spiders, i didnt get banned.

I used epicbot for my wc level 99. 77-99 wc.

Read full topic
